Support Our Campaign

Dezmond is running for Commissioner of District 1 in Charles County because he believes our community deserves leadership that listens, organizes, and delivers. This campaign is about integrity, accountability, and building a county that works for everyone—not just the ones in the know.

But grassroots leadership requires grassroots support.

If you believe in investing in proven leadership, deep community roots, and a future-focused vision for Charles County, please consider making a contribution today. Every donation, no matter the size, helps us reach voters, share this message, and build the movement our county deserves.

Contribution Rules

By making a contribution, you confirm that:

  1. I am a U.S. citizen or lawfully admitted permanent resident (i.e., green card holder).
  2. I am at least eighteen years old.
  3. This contribution is made from my own funds, and funds are not being provided to me by another person or entity for the purpose of making this contribution.

Americans living abroad may only contribute through ActBlue while physically in the United States. By proceeding with this transaction, you agree to ActBlue's terms & conditions.

Together, we will make it work.
